version_description: - Updated to the most recent version of PlayCreek Engine

- support for iOS8 and native resolution on new devices
- added Halloween Theme
- iPad fixes

v.1.40
- new game mode - Blitz. How much can you destroy in 2 minutes?
- iOS 64-bit support
- optimizations and bugfixes
v.1.30
- added Halloween Theme and new Halloween Survival stage
- added support for Google Play Games Leaderboards and Achievements
- a dozen of new Halloween characters including zombies, demons, sorcerers, and a huge flying pumpkin!

- Christmas update with new content
- new game mode - Christmas Blitz
- new enemies including Santa, Snowman and Giant War Robots
- improved support for iOS 9

- Major update: experience (XP) system, earn free coins playing Blitz mode and unlock all content for free!
- new levels, new enemies
- bugfixes and improvements

you ask, we listen:
- Blitz mode is now 3 minutes long instead of 2!
- no more ads on startup
- free mini-games and bonuses every day
- experience (XP) system, earn free coins playing Blitz mode and unlock all content for free!
- new levels, new enemies
- bugfixes and improvements
Major update - All new Death Worm 2.0 experience!
Each Worm now has a unique super ability!
Added Daily Missions with valuable rewards!
